actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain land shall be held in trust for the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe in North Dakota and South Dakota.

summary.text: Provides that lands enumerated in this Act shall be held in trust for the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe in North Dakota and South Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain land shall be held in trust for the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe in North Dakota and South Dakota.
